00027 struct abstract_distance
00028 {
00029     virtual double
00030     operator() (const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double>& v1, const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double>& v2) =0;
00031 };
00032 
00033 struct euclidean_distance : abstract_distance
00034 {
00035     double operator() (const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double>& v1, const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double>& v2)
00036     {
00037         return boost::numeric::ublas::norm_2(v1-v2);
00038     }
00039 };
